titles.title: HP207 Rejoice and be glad! the Redeemer has come!

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rejoice and be glad!
the Redeemer has come!
Go, look on His cradle,
His Cross, and His tomb.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rejoice and be glad! for the Lamb that was slain
O'er death is triumphant, and liveth again.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Rejoice and be glad!
now the pardon is free!
The Just for the unjust has died on the tree.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Rejoice and be glad! for our King is on high;
He pleadeth for us on His throne in the sky.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Rejoice and be glad! for He cometh again;
He cometh in glory the Lamb that was slain.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Sound His praises,
tell the story
Of Him who was slain!
Sound His praises,
tell with gladness,He liveth again!
